post.body: My favorte line was one I improved, "Who are these bozos?"
Group Sex is just finalizing a distributor and should hopefully be out after the first of the year. Screening ops to come.
Thanks I'll let him know.
You are very welcome.
what up?
i just put Joyner's art in a movie I made called Group Sex. I actually gave him a camaeo in the film as well. great guy.
are you on here my friend?
we Heroes love us some WholeFoods
needs a drink called the 'Parkman'. Tall, SFV, X-hot, X-shot, 2 splenda, Decaf Latte. AKA, cup of hot water that's delish!
My pleasure, you're the one who got me twitting. See you on set soon I hope. Great job last night on screen. Miss ya.
no idea. but it just feels like it's gonna get good.
It is. If you reach our booking agent he will have all details on our availability. www.bandfromtv.org
Not enough wax in the world.
Baseketball was a really fun film to shoot. One of those odd cult comedies. Matt and Trey are great guys. Not great actors.
ALL proceeds the band brings in (almost 2 mil over the last 2 years) goes right out to our charities. List on our website.
www.bandfromtv.org would LOVE to play Pendleton. We are making arrangements to play Vandenburg.
Best. Compliment. Ever.
No YOU'RE awesome for following me.
Oh, and Thanks to @RickMacMerc for hooking it up. Or as I like to call him Slick Rick!
you are the rock star! I had a blast and can't wait to do it again. Already having MacOSKen withdrawls!!!! Thanks, man.
is reading MY mind.
www.BandFromTV.org has all the deets on upcoming shows. Next up we playing for the troops. No tix for that.
@thenoshow the interview won't be finished and up for 3 weeks I'm told
Got Thor those for my kids last time I was over there. Love them.
Can I join in on the fun sometime? Parkman likes to podcast... guys... Guys? Come back!
got it
I'm speaking at the AES American Epilepsy Society conference. I'm the 50th advocate on EpilepsyAdvocate.com.
@Heroes is shot about 7 episodes ahead. And the rest of this volume are really great. Tons of good twists and turns coming.
Details on the E Conference deets at EpilepsyAdvocate.com
Thank you to you and all who watch me and support me in Russia.
only 9 without parole.
have a great flight. I'm gettin on my own damn plane -- to Seattle. Gonna be fun. Packing now. Suggestions?
5.1 Podcast was my nickname in high school.
why?
www.amazon.com/bandfromtv will be available all over the world on the other Amazon Sites very soon. Thanks for the Q.
fame is all over the Emerald City. Love this brisk dry weather. Rain up here? I don't buy that for a second.
could be very helpful wanna make it all legal-like for sure.
I get it. You have a lot of secrets and don't want me poking around in there. Not a problem. Thanks for following me.
is a very smart man.
just gave me an idea. Cinnabon with ranch instead of frosting. I like it.
and I will call security as well. Pat your head? What?
we've talked about this already. You're in for sure. Can I visit YOUR set is the question? And I hate olives BTW.
Both.
that is a dangerous WINK my friend. Klowenberg visiting me on the set today I hope. Call me when you land buddy.
sounds good. Contact our booking agent Seth. His info is on our band site www.bandfromtv.org Thanks much
a dvd copy would ROCK. But just a link to it on-line would also rock. Or a...whatever. Thanks much.
What is that? Where can I find it?
is asking me to stop sending pics from the set. Or at least that's what I'm getting.
I think something has been living IN that hair for years.
that was 16 hours ago. How'd I do? Thanks for watching... LOVIN' The Twitter, so thanks for that.
your movie tees are awesome. Love them. Check 'em out peeps. Thanks and congrats on you making the list as well.
fourth
you are the MAN!
yes, then after the first of the year, "Vol. 4, Fugitives" begins.
You just have to adjust the size of your web page to make it all fit.
Not on the menu at that link. What's Monster Style?
do I die? I have not read it yet... how have you? Chory is directing, yeah?
100 million Grunny watchers in China, huh? How 'bout a buck a piece? Come on! Okay, a dime... that's awesome! Sheh-Sheh
"Security!!!!!"
or a one and a half special with a side of gun and diamonds... you always get your moolahs worth with Grunny
is the the actor who plays the puppet master BTW, for those who were like..."wha-in-the-who-it-fart-wah-which-vill-in-whah"?
so many bad guys - so little time...left in the season 3. Sad to see Jamie Hector go, he was awesome!
that was a good time. I got a little mobbed at that place. and ZI think i got ripped off a bit. great crab legs tho...not cheap!
you bet your ass I do egon! Have you not been following long?
He IS doing well thanks to all of you guys. Glad you're on here Tweeting...
never heard back from. Shaq is a one way Twiterer. A Twit. Wilw is the real deal. And Me, I'm Grunny Damnit!!!!
can do no wrong...am I right?
I need something cool and magic-like to do as Matt Parkman on @Heroes. You are the king! Twitter back!
thanks. I didn't even know. where was that list published?
BUSTED!!!!!!!
unfortunately it was @desolatax
you re SO right. Thank you to @breagrant for turning me on to Twitter and putting me in Twitter-Therapy.
you are such a geek for posting your shoes. Nike rules and those are AWESOME! Who helped you get them?!!!!!!!!!!
But he doesn't have GRUNNY followers. Grunny followers are the kind of followers who...uh...they...uh...can...drink ranch!
IS THE LUCKY NUMBER 10K. PLEASE SEND ME YOUR ADDRESS TO REDEEM YOUR SIGNED HEROES STUFF. AND THANKS TO ALL!!!!!!
You think I MAY be on TV? Come on Buck! You love a good Hero just like the next guy. BuckHollywood RULES!
you are going to get me to 100,000 from that Tweet. You are the king!! I love you Wilw!
Done. I'm following you!
tru dat. I will turn on my alerts. Thanks for that.
whoa re those guys? Not kidding. I'm so out of the loop on web celebs...
I hate traffic in LA http://twitpic.com/pv9k
Man, that sounded WAY too much like a ad in a personals column.
That is pretty crazy that @Starbucks has a twitter account. Classic.
I LOVE the art or Eric Joyner http://ericjoyner.tumblr.com/
Song suggestions for www.bandfromtv.org for the Troops. I need to hear from you guys. Thanks.
Thank you to those who have purchased the DVD/CD 'Hoggin All The Covers'. Charities thank you too. Tell others.
I must let the world know that my brother Brad Grunberg is a guest star on House tonight. He's the greatest and he rocks. Check it out!
Thanks @ProfOrganizer you ROCK -- TV Guide, pg 8, & pg 29, full-page BandFromTV ad!
Band From TV playing for the Troops and their families January 17th. Busy drumming rockin' weekend.
Greatest YouTube Video EVER. That's right I said EVER!!!!!! http://tinyurl.com/62ghx4
I may not watch the Superbowl now. The Office? Where's the love?
Tweet him don't call Cuban.
Don't call him. Tweet him.
I never said he's the one doing the flying...
Milo prepares for flight http://twitpic.com/q1e0
Dennys coffee and Wendy works wonders. http://twitpic.com/pvu0
Thanks BigFatDummy
ha ha ha ha ha! Best. Casting. Ever.
Grunny in Hollow Man is almost the invisible man, because it is NOT an actor's movie. But a cool film no doubt! Fun to shoot too!
Another INCREDIBLE casting move on Heroes. You guys are going to freak! Can't talk about it. www.talkaboutit.org
Instead of using a 9, OJ gets 9!
Dog poops on Pine St. http://twitpic.com/r09h
Rick Yeager rocks.
What ARE my numbers? Can't see them on twitterific.
That was me. I haven't heard it yet. Did I suck??
Wil who??? http://twitpic.com/qvbm
What is the best app for twitter on my iPhone?
Thousands?
Seattle ROCKS http://twitpic.com/qjj3 http://twitpic.com/qumk
nutragrain bar dipped in ranch. Nah. Too healthy.
just got the fish I caught at Pike's Fish delivered by UPS. Yummy. Huge box. Bagel Lox and Cream Cheese anyone. on me.
must find a way to INCLUDE those who have purchased the DVDs already. If not, can't do the auction. Not fair. Still hungry.
Amazon is actually going to run an auction in January giving away signed guitars by the band. Very cool. But I need something bigger.
ebay the experience... good idea, but again that would just appeal to the richest of folks. Not my true peeps.
You now what @funkyp56, I hate your character, so there!
Probably wouldn't do it until I had over 10K following me to make it great. Just found an oreo under a couch pillow. Won't kill me...
Good point @mattredman, must work out the travel part. Could be done. I know a guy. I feel like a calzone for breakfast, why not.
More Thoughts: Don't know if that would work. But I like steak and eggs. And ranch dressing. My mind is wondering...
Maybe I can tie it to the sale of our charity band DVD on www.amazon.com/bandfromtv Buy the DVD keep your rec. and I draw a number... hmmm.
My Thoughs: Must create some Twitter contest for charity where someone gets to hang out with me on the set for a couple of hours... help...
Who else wants to visit me on set?
never waits for my Mac to turn off by itself in the 60 seconds that tick away. Always in a rush to make it go dark. Mac trust issues...
Nuf said. Visit THIS!!! http://twitpic.com/rie9
following @biz who is a GENIUS and a pretty nice guy from what I hear. Wondering if Brea can eat ranch dressing... probably not.
Did the governor of Ill really think he could get away with it? That HAIR I mean...
http://twitpic.com/sl3o -
how do I upload a pic from my computer to twitter again?
Grunny Mission 12/13/08: Balance a ball on your nose. Keep trying for at least 1 minute. Post a pic. Have fun. Laugh. Mission Complete.
T-Bone Burnett RULES!!!!
greggrunberg.com will be launching in a matter of days. I hope you check it out.
New greggrunberg home page. Love it. Check it out. I'm loving this Twitter stuff.
Missions, Special Assignments... Huh, Ken?
Grunny Missions WOULD rock, but only if there's proof. Gotta take a snap shot of the completed mission. Like on Alias. Yeah baby!
G4 was not the first in Hollywood with 4Gs in it's name. I broke the mold. Thank you MacMerc.com for helping with my new twitter home page
So the hugs seemed to have worked out for most. bartowski is asking for daily GRUNNY MISSIONS... who's with that?
That guy int he elevator was totally shocked. First cause he watches Heroes, then by the bear hug I gave him. NIce!
Who hugged a stranger today? I did. Casting director for American Dad Linda. Not really a stranger since she hired me, but...
100 X 100 is a cheeseburger snake. Ladies?
hug somebody you do NOT know today. Just cause...
NO MEAT. I hear that girl LOVES THE MEAT!!!!!!
Try a 4X4. 4 patties of beef and 4 slices of cheese animal style. Then ask the EMTs use the paddles cause you'll need em...
Animal Style Fries: noun. Meaning 'In N Out' french fries slathered with cheese, grilled onions, special sauce, and TLC. Call 911 asap.
I never said I didn't won it. I just said it is confusing me.
extra HOT by the way! E-X-T-R-A HAAAAWWWWTTTTT!!!!
Get your tough hard hitting questions ready for the Podcast. Bring it bitches! I just had a double latte... YEAH!!!!!!!
Oh... to have people to twitter for me. One day! One day! Uhhhhhgggg... sorry, bad dream... wooof! Shake it off!
must say @dhlawrencexvii has been my favorite villain so far. In all 3 seasons that is. He rocks as an actor and a person!
You should come to expect the unexpected. Then expect that even that will change.
went to the newsstand. News? No idea... But I learned one thing... Brad and Angelina love kids. Having them. Saving them. Having more.
that video WILL work in your region on GREGGRUNBERG.COM I can promise you that. Coming VERY Soon.
Direct link to Tom Green paprazzii'ng my car in Hollywood. Hilarious. http://www.tomgreen.com/?video=1327
http://talkaboutit.org
Tom Green video'd my car in a Hollywood parking lot and didn't know it was mine! Check it out: http://www.tomgreen.com/
Must find a new avatar to celebrate the 10K mark. But what? Any suggestions?
http://tinyurl.com/7lx6zc
I'm gonna take a Ranch Dressing Bubble Bath to celebrate! Any takers? Come on, Wilw and bring the rubber bacon bits ducky!!!!
YEEEEAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!! THANK YOU GUYS!!!!!!!!! DANCING AROUND THE HOUSE WITH MY KIDS!!!!!!!! WHOOOO-HOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!
No unfollowing and refollowing please...
AND an empty bottle of Ranch dressing.
